A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Bots and naysayer's be d***Ed!  This was a great Star Wars movie with lots of action and intrigue!  The characters were well fleshed out and fun. Everyone who complained the Force Awakens was too similar to A New Hope are probably the same people who are complaining now that this was too different.  Some people will just never be satisfied and the rest seem to be bots bringing the score down!  See it yourself and ignore the noise!
